snippet: Avery Bradley scored 25 points, Isiah Thomas had 22 and the Boston Celtics held off the Sacramento Kings 128-119 on Sunday for their ninth win in 10 games....
lead_paragraph: Avery Bradley scored 25 points, Isiah Thomas had 22 and the Boston Celtics held off the Sacramento Kings 128-119 on Sunday for their ninth win in 10 games.

headline.main: Avery Bradley's 25 Points Helps Celtics Beat Kings 128-119
headline.print_headline: Avery Bradley's 25 Points Helps Celtics Beat Kings 128-119
